javadoc: The VariableTypeFieldLocation class provides specific information about the variable type field within a program location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: locationAddr
params.comment: the address of the listing location (i.e., referent code unit)

params.name: var
params.comment: the variable associated with this type field location.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the position within the function name string for this location.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct a new VariableTypeFieldLocation object.
 Variable function entry point is the assumed listing location (i.e., referent code unit).
 Care should be taken if variable corresponds to an EXTERNAL function.

params.name: var
params.comment: the variable associated with this type field location.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the position within the function name string for this location.

methods.javadoc: Should only be used by XML restoration.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Should only be used by XML restoration.

methods.javadoc: Return the function stack variable type string at this location.
methods.name: getType
methods.comment: Return the function stack variable type string at this location.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.

name: VariableTypeFieldLocation
comment:
The VariableTypeFieldLocation class provides specific information
 about the variable type field within a program location.
